title: Holiday Markets Are Volatile, Unpredictable and Dangerous: Hedge While You Can
text:
I've learned some hard lessons throughout my career on many fronts but the one that has wreaked the most havoc is the assumption that "this year will be different" when it comes to holiday marketsAlmost without fail, either stocks, commodities, bonds, or all of the above experience unusually treacherous conditions through November and December of ...
